projectGridLines.description:
Title: Review and Validation of models used for Valuation and Risk measurement of Derivatives Products

Description: Reviewing and validating models used for the valuation and risk measurement of derivatives products involves assessing mathematical models, software packages like Python/ Quantlib to determine the fair value and associated risks of derivative instruments.

Skill sets: Quantitative finance, Python/Quantlib programming and regulatory knowledge

Traits expectation: Analytical Skills, Quantitative analysis, problem solving, good communication skills. 

Expected learning: Model Validation, Hands-on experience in implementing and testing derivative pricing models. 

Specific courses required for project execution:  NA

Title: Development and validation of PD, LGD, EAD and ECL credit risk models along with impairment calculations, macroeconomic modeling and SICR.

Description: Credit risk models estimate the likelihood that a borrower will default on their credit obligations within a given timeframe and validation involves assessing the accuracy and reliability of these models through statistical tests, back-testing, and benchmarking against observed default rates.

Skill sets: Credit Risk Modeling, Data Analysis, Programming, Financial Accounting, Regulatory Knowledge.

Traits expectation: Analytical Skills, Quantitative analysis, problem solving, good communication skills. 

Expected learning: Model Validation, Hands-on experience in implementing and testing financial instruments pricing models. 

Specific courses required for project execution:  NA
